body.content:
⁣Hello Mr / Mrs,

How are you ? Well I hope so, my name is Tremblay Charles, 76 years old born in Quebec of Canadian nationality and I live in Canada at the moment, I suffer from a serious disease which condemns me to certain death it is cancer of gorge, and I have a sum of 2,000,000 $ which I would like to make a donation to a trustworthy and honest person so that they can put it to good use. I lost my wife, 6 years ago, which affected me a lot and I have not been able to remarry until this day, unfortunately we had not had children.

I would like to donate this amount before my death, so that my days are numbered by the fault of this disease which I do not have got medicine to be healed. I would not like to know later, if you can benefit from this donation.
If you want, you can receive this donation and use at least 35% to make a donation to an association and the rest will be yours.
Here is my email address:tremblaycharles21@hotmail.com
Waiting to read you I own a webcam so you can see me and see my state of health.


Mr Tremblay Charles

....​
